parameterdescription.para: These bits select the division ratio between the DRP clock (DCLK) and the lower frequency ADC clock (ADCCLK) used for the ADC. 0/1/2 : 2 3 : 3 4 : 4 … 255 : 255

Select Sequence Mode ADC channel. [1] Not Simultaneous sampling mode bit0：Auxiliary channel 0 bit1：Auxiliary channel 1 bit2-bit15：Auxiliary channel 2 to 15 [2] Simultaneous sampling mode bit0：Auxiliary channel 0 and 8 bit1：Auxiliary channel 1 and 9 bit2：Auxiliary channel 2 and 10 bit3：Auxiliary channel 3 and 11 bit4：Auxiliary channel 4 and 12 bit5：Auxiliary channel 5 and 13 bit6：Auxiliary channel 6 and 14 bit7：Auxiliary channel 7 and 15

Enable the averaging of the channel data in a sequence, default is disable [1] Not Simultaneous sampling mode bit0：Auxiliary channel 0 bit1：Auxiliary channel 1 bit2-bit15：Auxiliary channel 2 to 15 [2] Simultaneous sampling mode bit0：Auxiliary channel 0 and 8 bit1：Auxiliary channel 1 and 9 bit2：Auxiliary channel 2 and 10 bit3：Auxiliary channel 3 and 11 bit4：Auxiliary channel 4 and 12 bit5：Auxiliary channel 5 and 13 bit6：Auxiliary channel 6 and 14 bit7：Auxiliary channel 7 and 15

briefdescription.para: xadc sequence mode set bipolar mode

parameterdescription.para: Configure an ADC channel as bipolar in the sequence, default is unipolar input mode. [1] Not Simultaneous sampling mode bit0：Auxiliary channel 0 bit1：Auxiliary channel 1 bit2-bit15：Auxiliary channel 2 to 15 [2] Simultaneous sampling mode bit0：Auxiliary channel 0 and 8 bit1：Auxiliary channel 1 and 9 bit2：Auxiliary channel 2 and 10 bit3：Auxiliary channel 3 and 11 bit4：Auxiliary channel 4 and 12 bit5：Auxiliary channel 5 and 13 bit6：Auxiliary channel 6 and 14 bit7：Auxiliary channel 7 and 15

Enable or disable ADC settling time extended to 10 ADCCLK cycles. [1] Not Simultaneous sampling mode bit0：Auxiliary channel 0 bit1：Auxiliary channel 1 bit2-bit15：Auxiliary channel 2 to 15 [2] Simultaneous sampling mode bit0：Auxiliary channel 0 and 8 bit1：Auxiliary channel 1 and 9 bit2：Auxiliary channel 2 and 10 bit3：Auxiliary channel 3 and 11 bit4：Auxiliary channel 4 and 12 bit5：Auxiliary channel 5 and 13 bit6：Auxiliary channel 6 and 14 bit7：Auxiliary channel 7 and 15
dma buffer length 0 for 4 bytes (1 word) 1 for 8 bytes (2 word) 2 for 12 bytes (3 word) ... 0xFFF for 16kbyte.
